title: cCBCitra
author: cCBCitra
content: Crypto Craft Brewhouse is an  NFT dedicated to post-quantum security across the blockchain.  Our mission is simple enjoy great beer while providing a launchpad for post-quantum cryptographic blockchain.   We host virtual and in person Stammtisch events where we discuss issues and advancements in quantum computing. We will bring the cross-disciplinary strengths of Web3 to these areas, to share ideas, to discuss the current state of the art, and to collaborate on research topics. Initiation Fee - 2.5 ETHWe do not have a discord. We have a  community only accessible via holding an NFT.  Without an NFT you cannot have a voice in our community. All NFTs are linked to our quantum research DAO (to be named) and each NFT gives you a % of vote in the final decisions of R & D awards. If you hold a lot of NFTs you have more weight on the voting and what’s decided.Site: cryptocraftbrewhouse.comContract:  0xC4779EBC88DB35e4f7bd9D526C8833C26C1F704
